text: Animation Magazine is a monthly publication covering the animation industry, including different reviews about film and television animation, visual effects and video games. ==Other websites== * Animationmagazine.net * Animation Magazine Online TV * Article on Jason Donati's Unique Teaching Techniques - "Canvassing the Big Screen" by Ellen Wolff â€“ Animation Magazine - December 2006 Category:American monthly magazines Category:Animation
